testcase.name: chromium › Employee Master Data Module functionality › Scenario Outline name:As a user , if I click Lines per page "10" 10, 25 and 50 , number of the rows in employee table it should bring correctly
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Dashboard with "english" language.......................passed Then verify that dashboard page tab name contains QUGEM...................passed Then I click the Employee_Master_data module..............................passed Then I select "GESAMT FIRMEN" using the company selection button, and c...passed Then I delete if in any row, surname column text is tester or developer...passed Then verify if you write tester or developer in filter surname, row1 is...passed Then I delete all filter sections to start every test Scenario with a c...passed When I check if Lines per page select button is functional and visible....passed Then I click "10" employee choose in Lines Per Page.......................passed And I verify the number of rows in employee table is not more than the ...passed Then I verify next page button is visible and clickable...................passed Then I click employee table next page button , and verify number of row...passed Then I click previous page button is visible and clickable................passed Then I click employee table previous page button , and verify number of...passed
